s: December 29, 2024 - Beveridge first produced his spirits ... vodka as gifts and using a pot still. Commercial production began in 1997 when Beveridge formed Fifth Generation, Inc. and established the Mockingbird Distillery, producing 1,000 cases that year. In 2007, the brand sold over 160,000 cases. Production remains at the heavily expanded southeast Austin distillery. Sales and distribution of Tito's Handmade Vodka expanded ...

t: TITO'S HANDMADE VODKA 700ML – ICONIC Beverages
s: Born in 1995 in the first legal distillery in Texas, The Mockingbird Distillery, Tito's Handmade Vodka is America's original craft vodka and in 2019, became America's highest selling spirit. Tito's Handmade Vodka is six times distilled from corn in old fashioned copper pot stills.
